title: AMD Radeon Software 24.2.1 is ready for Helldivers 2 and more
text: For new game releases like Helldivers 2, Skull and Bones, and Nightingale, AMD has released their AMD Software 24.2.1 beta driver for Radeon graphics cards. This driver update also contains a large number of fixes for Radeon users, all of which are listed below.   AMD Software: Adrenalin Edition 24.2.1 supports graphics cards as far back as AMDâ€™s Radeon RX 5000 series. This driver only supports RDNA based Radeon graphics cards. PC gamers can download AMD’s 24.2.1 GPU driver for RDNA and newer GPUs here. You can join the discussion on AMD’s 24.2.1 GPU driver for Helldivers 2 on the OC3D Forums.
